alert.note: Alert for Eastern Santa Monica Mountains Recreational Area; Interstate 5 Corridor; San Miguel and Santa Rosa Islands; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Barbara County Southwestern Coast; Santa Cruz and Anacapa Islands; Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range; Southern Ventura County Mountains; Western Antelope Valley Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 06 at 6:13AM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. Isolated gusts of 70 to 80 mph are possible in the most wind-prone areas from the mountains of eastern Santa Barbara County eastward to Los Angeles County. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being in forested areas and around large trees. If possible, remain inside and avoid windows. Use extra caution if you must drive.
